result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael T. Fosterling was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall submit to a DNA sample at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department.  Defendant to set up a payment plan with the Clerk of Court's office regarding payment of the costs.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Michael T. Fosterling in court with attorney John T. Stichert.  Defendant Michael T. Fosterling in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea agreement put into the record.  Plea of not contest to OAR - Count 2.  Plea freely, knowingly and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court dismissed and read in Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty of OAR and orders court costs; DNA sample and surcharge.  Defendant to set up payment plan with the clerk's office.  - rt

Defendant Michael T. Fosterling in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint, charges and penalties.  Court informs defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant waives the time limits for a preliminary hearing.   Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 02:00 pm.  - rt

Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the court. Defendant shall comply with booking procedures at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department. Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

Initial Appearance on December 29, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.
Arrest Report

Attorney Kristi Tlusty appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Michael T. Fosterling appears in person, in custody.  Court finds probable cause for arrest without warrant based on the arrest header.  Attorney Tlusty requests a $250.00 cash bond and $2,000.00 signature bond; booking and no operation of motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Court orders bond as requested by Attorney Tlusty.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Next court date is December 29, 2015 at 1:00 pm.  - rt
